snippet: Andrew Garfield’s Biff, in “Death of a Salesman” on Broadway, is just the latest in a string of conflicted, richly complex characters this 28-year-old actor has played in his short but already impressive career.
abstract: Andrew Garfield’s portrayal of Biff, in Broadway's Death of a Salesman is the latest in a string of conflicted, richly complex characters the actor has played in his short but already impressive career.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Garfield’s Biff, in “Death of a Salesman” on Broadway, is just the latest in a string of conflicted, richly complex characters this 28-year-old actor has played in his short but already impressive career.

headline.seo: Andrew Garfield on Playing Biff Loman and Spider-Man
headline.main: His Own Network of Tortured Souls
headline.print_headline: His Own Network of Tortured Souls
